channel.title: Cursor on Uncle Xiang's Notebook
channel.description: Recent content in Cursor on Uncle Xiang's Notebook

item.title: Cursor AI programming IDE trial
item.description:
Another year has passed. The biggest change at work is the noticeably increased involvement of AI. Previously, switching between different development languages required developers to be familiar with various APIs. Now, these basic code snippets can be generated by AI – a great boon for developers.

ChatGPT

Back in 2023, I revised two introductory articles. Now it’s 2025, and frankly, there hasn’t been a significant improvement. It still requires developing one’s own understanding, being able to reasonably break down tasks, and most importantly, identifying bugs in AI-generated code.

Github copilot

I can’t recall the exact date, but I saw information stating that Singapore has deployed servers for domestic use. This means we no longer need to constantly use a VPN; only a VPN is required for login, after which it can be turned off.

I use Github Copilot more often; this plugin can be used directly in VS Code and Visual Studio without switching between programs. Compared to ChatGPT, Github Copilot offers better project support and a friendlier interface. You can feed it portions of local files to generate code that aligns with your project.

Cursor AI

I recently saw a new AI programming IDE, Cursor AI. This IDE is based on GitHub Copilot, but it’s even more intelligent and can help you create files directly.

It feels pretty good after a quick try, but my understanding of the existing project is still not enough. When dealing with many local project files and large-scale refactoring and optimization, I still need 开发者拆分任务.

Switch to curso’s engineering mode, enter: Create a personal resume webpage with support for multiple style switching. Remember to fill in some personal information for data display.

After a few tries, you’ll be able to get the following webpage. Of course, it’s still quite simple, but it’s pretty good for beginners.

Currently, registered users can enjoy 150 free trials of the premium API; paid users are limited to 5000 calls

Please provide the Chinese text you want me to translate. I am ready when you are! Just paste the text here.
